website_summaries.verdict: This brown rice pasta has a good taste and cooks like regular pasta.
pros: Similar to wheat pasta in look
cons: Just like regular pasta, this will not taste good if it's overcooked
Best to undercook it just slightly

customer_reviews.title: Only one of the bags in this bundle says organic on it.
customer_reviews.text: Not all 3 packages in the bundle state they are Organic. This is very important when I am buying what I believe is a bundle of organic pasta. I wouldn't have bought this bundle if I would have known the elbows and spirals are not organic. I have looked all over each package to see the word organic and can't find it. Both bags state certified kosher and non-GMO, but no word of organic that I can find.
customer_reviews.author: LK28

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as regular noodles!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently suffered 3 miscarriages and found that I have hypothyroidism. Going gluten free is said to help with the miscarriages for people with hypothyroidism. I've never eaten anything gluten free but I've heard horror stories about how awful it is. Tonight I made the penne noodles with my homemade Alfredo sauce. I won't lie, I was nervous. I swear to you, these noodles are no different than regular noodles and I did NOT receive a free product for my review! Seriously, I even gave my picky husband a bite and he agreed that they are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: AebKahle

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten Free Pasta ever
customer_reviews.text: Tastes just like regular pasta. I’m so glad I found this. I can’t have folic acid which is in all “enriched or fortified” foods; therefore, I have to eat gluten free. The other brands I tried have been disgusting, very sticky and mushy and you couldn’t make any cold pasta salads. This brand is not like that. I highly recommend. Even people who can have gluten wouldn’t be able to tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this Pasta
customer_reviews.text: These pastas are the closest I have found to the quality and texture of "regular" pastas. I don't eat pasta as often as I used to, but when I do, this is what I look for and purchase. This order was sent to my mother, who is also gluten intolerant. She loves the pasta and has used the elbows to make macaroni salad. She had purchased one of the big brands from her local supermarket and they turned to mush. However, the Tinkyada held up well and there was negligible texture difference (slightly softer than regular pasta, but not mushy).
customer_reviews.author: SEP7

customer_reviews.title: I can enjoy cook-outs again!
customer_reviews.text: This is great pasta for me as I have found that I cannot digest processed flour. And all along my doctors thought I had a gluten allergy! I love the elbows because it means I can make macaroni salad and eat it with my veggie dogs and not feel left out at cook-outs! And brown rice pasta is so soft, not chewy, and you can over cook it without worrying. Tinkyada makes a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alice G

customer_reviews.title: Tastes just like regular pasta, but better.
customer_reviews.text: No mush, tastes like regular pasta, we’ve all switched to tinkyada, even those without allergies. No bloating, easily digested. Love it!! All noodles in this brand are great, tried them all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fin's Mom

customer_reviews.title: How could rice taste so bad?
customer_reviews.text: Rice is my favorite carb, so it was quite a surprise that this pasta tasted bad. The texture was more like glue than rubber, certainly not like pasta. Bad value for the money since the barely sampled 3 pack went into the garbage. Now I buy new gluten free pastas at the store 1 pack at a time so it won't be such a waste if it's nasty.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: They won’t even know it’s Gluten-Free!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten-free pasta I have found. Just make sure and rinse in cold water after draining like the package says-makes all the difference. I have even made this for my husband and kids (who don’t require a GF diet) and they never even knew!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten Free Pasta I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I made the elbows yesterday for pasta salad and it has held up overnight. The taste is good and the texture is really soft. I might cook it less than the recommended time in the future and see how that goes. This is my new go-to gf pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Are you sure I'm not eating regular pasta? I've had gluten free pastas in the past, but they all got mushy or had in an ingredient that I couldn't use. I love this brand and I will continue to buy it as long as they remain consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My hands down favorite.
customer_reviews.text: As with many foods this product is too pricey on Amazon. The product itself is hands down my favorite gluten free pasta that I've tried. There is no under or after taste and the noodles are good for use in any recipe. The no mush part, not so true if you leave them for even a minute too long, so just mind your cooking times.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE BEST GLUTEN FREE PASTA EVER
customer_reviews.text: We love this brand. All the pastas are tasty and SO EASY to make. You literally boil for 2 minutes, turn off the heat, cover and 15 minutes later, viola! Pasta. The texture is like regular pasta, it never falls apart or clumps together. Just AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Van Arsdale

customer_reviews.title: Best rice pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a blogger posted and I love it!! Quick to make - boil for 1-2 minutes and let sit for 10 minutes. Great for my high crab days but don’t feel guilty or bloated (gluten free) after!
customer_reviews.author: Elpida Athanasiadis

customer_reviews.title: Used to get it at Whole Foods....
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pasta I will eat. It's the only gluten free pasta that tastes like pasta. I love it so much. Total comfort food. Excellent product. Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Harriette Knight

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever GLUTEN FREE PASTA
customer_reviews.text: Making homemade chicken noodle soup for my husband who’s been sick. It’s the most like all other pastas and has the best taste You cannot tell that it’s gluten free. It’s good to my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: LadybugDragonfly

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love it! it's real gluten free and taste good... It's not like those cheap awful pasta that they sell in grocery stores where it says gluten free. those are fake don't buy it... they add sugar in it to make them taste better. this pasta is the REAL DEAL....
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great Wheat Pasta Substitute
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pasta substitute that tastes like pasta to me. My husband can’t tell the difference either. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna E James

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like normal pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be closest to "traditional" pasta. I have tried many other brands and pretty much gave up on eating pasta once I decided to eat gluten free because they were so awful. But this pasta is amazing! It isn't gummy nor does it taste like cardboard. It tastes the same when first cooked and the next day. I think you will be pleased and will buy again as I have reordered already.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten-Free Pasta
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of gluten-free pastas. Using the energy efficient directions gets the best results. My husband doesn't even know I use it in his favorite pasta dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and not mushy
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta alternative. I am gluten sensitive and this is the best brand of brown rice pasta I have found yet! Doesn't get that gross mushy texture like most others do.
customer_reviews.author: Randel

customer_reviews.title: best GF noodles ever
customer_reviews.text: This brand of GF noodles are great. They taste like regular noodles. They don't get mushy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kershner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste and texture without wheat.
customer_reviews.text: I did not find anything I did not like about it, and am using it for all my pasta dishes.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but High price.
customer_reviews.text: Brown rice is healthy. At that price, past could be a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia K.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The noodles are good. They cook well . I am allergy to wheat so the noodles are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Over the top

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: First gluten free pasta that has a texture similar to traditional pasta. Like, +95% similar. Don't listen to the negative reviews. This is legit good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gluten Free Pasta
customer_reviews.text: These gluten free pastas make a restrictive diet much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Paulekas

customer_reviews.title: Best GF/corn free pasta I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: These noodles really satiated my cravings for real pasta! Unlike other gluten/corn free pasta,these don’t turn slimy once cooled and work great for cold pasta salads. I’ll be regular consumer of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F

customer_reviews.title: Only Received One Organic Bag, Other Two Were Not Organic
customer_reviews.text: Description and photo shows three organic gluten-free pasta bags, however, the in the shipment I received, only one bag (Penne) is organic — the other two (spirals and elbows) are not organic. If you do order, please check what you actually receive... based on other reviews, I was not the only one that this happened to.
customer_reviews.author: Nom de Plume

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tho I wish Whole Foods still carried it
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Whole Foods Market made the ridiculous decision to stop carrying Tinkyada pastas, and my local Publix only carries the Tinkyada white rice pasta. I had almost always only bought the elbows, but the penne is wonderful and will be my new go-to when I don’t buy the variety pack.
customer_reviews.author: JPlanet

customer_reviews.title: Best Noodles
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten free noodles. Taste like regular noodles but we feel better after eating these. Use them in all my old & new recipes
customer_reviews.author: Helen Czernenko

customer_reviews.title: Follow the timing suggested, it’ll turn out great.
customer_reviews.text: This gluten free pasta tastes just like the real McCoy. Not even my finicky, adult son can tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Chiefie

customer_reviews.title: Cook it right
customer_reviews.text: This pasta is amazing and for the customer that said it was disgusting and mushy you probably didn't cook it correctly you have to have boiling water and you have to cook it a little longer than regular pasta
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great GF pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell this brown rice pasta is GF, just delicious!!! Tinkyada is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Not good over done
customer_reviews.text: Cooking instructions not accurate. You can overcook. Consider less time, sample early. Not good over done.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Borreson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great & not soggy!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tasting brown rice pastas I've had! I even sneak it into our family meals & no one notices it's not regular pasta! LOL! I love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Aya O

customer_reviews.title: As good as wheat
customer_reviews.text: This product cold and tastes like wheat pasta. Great product for a gluten free diet.
customer_reviews.author: ohio 45459

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for any gluten-free pasta. They weren’t slimy. And they were pretty flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: sequin74

customer_reviews.title: Best sub for regular noodles!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT!!! The closest I’ve found to regular noodles! No one can tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: sarmom

customer_reviews.title: Love Tankyada
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of GF pasta. It arrived safe, NOT broken to pieces. I will order from here again.
customer_reviews.author: livelikeno2morrow

customer_reviews.title: ... it does not get mushy or fall apart as easily as other rice pastas or corn based pastas
customer_reviews.text: This is the only gluten free pasta I cook with since it does not get mushy or fall apart as easily as other rice pastas or corn based pastas. Delightfully chewey and resilient.
customer_reviews.author: VFlower2011

customer_reviews.title: this is by far the best i have ever tried for g-free pastas
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best i have ever tried for g-free pastas, i will always buy this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: kittiekat

customer_reviews.title: Fool-proof GF pasta
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten-free pasta I have found. It would take work to overcook it enough to make it mushy - hard to mess this up.
customer_reviews.author: MNciv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is the absolute best gluten free pasta out there.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gluten-free pasta that can be cooked to al dente
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gluten-free pasta that can be cooked to al dente. They will get mushy if over cooked, but so will wheat noodles. Good taste, too.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great texture and taste!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gluten-free pasta. Great texture and taste. Just used it to make delicious vegan macaroni salad.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Can still get my pasta fix and not feel bloated and weighed down afterwards. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Clemens

customer_reviews.title: As good as normal pasta
customer_reviews.text: So grateful to find a gf pasta that is as good as normal! Better than any others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative, could fool anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Cool them a little less than regular pasta! Turn out very good and can't really tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It is a rice pasta.
customer_reviews.text: For a non wheat pasta (rice pasta) it tastes great but can’t compare to a good regular pasta
customer_reviews.author: robert d fraraccio

customer_reviews.title: You've got to try this pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! This is our new favorite pasta! It tastes great and it's good for you, unlike regular flour based pasta. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: Kristene

customer_reviews.title: Really good and tasty!!
customer_reviews.text: Really good and tasty, couldn’t even tell the difference from regular pasta.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Super taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Texture like regular pasta. Best whole grain pasta I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Maura L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gluten Intolerant Pasta Fans
customer_reviews.text: Tinkyada is my favorite gluten-free pasta. The taste and texture are as close to "regular" pasta as I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Better than pasta
customer_reviews.text: Cooks and tastes better than gluten pasta. Very happily surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor O.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think Tinkyada is the BEST gluten free pasta available.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious equals terrific
customer_reviews.text: Product 100% brown rice very heathy. Used in soups and sauces
customer_reviews.author: Helen M.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty with great texture.
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten free pasta ever. Even good warmed over. Tasty with great texture.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This pasta tastes wonderful, and it's a great option if you're watching your carbs, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Triller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how good the pasta is,much better than the white ones.
customer_reviews.author: carol m rader

customer_reviews.title: Healthiest Pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these at Whole Foods until recently they stopped carrying them. I have no idea why but this is the best pasta substitute out there. I love the taste and the nutritional value. This seller had the best price listed for this product! I’m certainly recording!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

product_meta.title: Tinkyada Organic Gluten-Free Brown Rice Pasta 3 Shape Variety Bundle, Elbow, Spirals, Penne Pasta, 12 oz
product_meta.description: Size:12 Ounce (Pack of 3)Tinkyada Organic Gluten-Free Brown Rice Pasta 3 Shape Variety Bundle: (1) Elbow Pasta, (1) Spirals Pasta, and (1) Penne Pasta, 12 Ounce Ea.
